title: Bug 2801[Dialogs] DCR: ErrorDialog should not always show the error icon (1GJU7TK)
description: Bug 2801[Dialogs] DCR: ErrorDialog should not always show the error icon (1GJU7TK)
OB: The class org.eclipse.jface.dialogs.ErrorDialog is used to display errorscontained in an IStatus. The problem with the dialog is that it shows anerror icon (red/cross) even though IStatus only has warnings or infos.The dialog would be more usable if the icon would correspond to the severityof IStatus and/or the dialog would offer to specify the image type (error, warning, info).NOTES:
